title: Does anyone know the names of the fonts used in this logo?
content:
HAve to recreate this logo and needed help identifying these two font. any help is appreciated.  
 [http://www.showmesoft.com/images/obergFreightLogo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824015729/http:/www.showmesoft.com/images/obergFreightLogo.jpg "http://www.showmesoft.com/images/obergFreightLogo.jpg")
author: flophouse85

comments.content:
Please post font ID requests in the proper forum:
